pageContext.claim: “I never knew about the meeting [at Trump Tower with Natalia Veselnitskaya].”
pageContext.analysis: This is different from what Trump told special counsel Robert Mueller in written answers to questions under penalty of perjury. "According to written answers submitted by President Trump, he has no recollection of learning of the meeting at the time, and the Office found no documentary evidence showing that he was made aware of the meeting — or its Russian connection — before it occurred," the Mueller report says. Donald Trump Jr. testified in Congress in 2017 that he could not remember whether he had told his father of the meeting in advance. Former Trump attorney Michael Cohen testified in Congress that Trump Jr. told his father about the meeting in advance.
